data.scheme_name: Quality Certification Assistance Scheme - Domestic certification - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides reimbursement of hallmark certification of upto Rs.5 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All existing units located anywhere in the State are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The reimbursement will be in addition to any support from the Government of India. 

The reimbursement shall not exceed the total expenditure incurred by the enterprise. 

The unit must have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal. 

The unit should not be on the restrictive list as notified by the State Government. 

The unit must have obtained No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable. 

The unit should be in commercial production. 

The unit must be in regular production at the time of disbursement.
data.beneficiaries: All existing units located anywhere in the State are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The reimbursement will be in addition to any support from the Government of India. 

The reimbursement shall not exceed the total expenditure incurred by the enterprise. 

The unit must have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) on the portal. 

The unit should not be on the restrictive list as notified by the State Government. 

The unit must have obtained No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable. 

The unit should be in commercial production. 

The unit must be in regular production at the time of disbursement.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: In the changed global scenario, one of the challenges is to increase the competitiveness of Micro, Small and  Medium Enterprises in terms of quality of products and improved management system. Therefore, there is a  need to support these enterprises to create awareness about the strengths and weaknesses of their existing operations and to provide them an opportunity to enhance their organizational strengths.
data.objective: To promote Quality Management systems and for strengthening their products marketing & exports.
data.description:
Scheme provides reimbursement of certifications:
Hallmark Certifications: 75% of total expenditure, upto Rs.5 lakhs per certification.
Other Country-Specific Certifications : 75% of total expenditure, upto Rs.10 lakhs per certification.
data.how_to_apply: Application on prescribed Form for the reimbursement of expenses incurred in acquiring certification along with listed documents should be submitted to the Director/ Director General, Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, through the web portal of the department.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
